name: ClearIt 13
description:
"ClearIt 13" is a large and bright game that includes over 220 multiple levels of various complexity with Match3 gameplay.
A large and bright game that includes multiple levels of various complexity. Shoot with the balls located at the edges of the field and hit the center. Your task is to place the balls of the same color next to each other. This will make them disappear. There should be no balls left on the field. Then you will proceed to the next level. The game time is unlimited, but the complexity grows with the levels. There are five games modes .
